analysis.key_quote: To turn jobs that require skill and knowledge into something that turn over with each Administration seems at best ill advised as the experience seasoned employees bring is invaluable in government the same as it is in the private sector.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the value of experienced civil servants and implies that the proposed rule would undermine the merit-based system by allowing for increased turnover and politicization, which aligns with opposition to the rule.
